title: Invention: The Bed
itunes:title: Invention: The Bed
description:
We sure do spend a lot of time in bed, but what exactly IS a bed and what were ancient beds like? In this invention-based episode of Stuff to Blow Your Mind, Robert and Joe explore the ancient history of the bed.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
